page.title: 20GAINSBOROUGH'S HYPERMARKET
page.content: Morrison's is a hypermarket.It has a car park with 440 spaces,8 for disabled people.There are 5 petrol pumps.Inside,there are other shops like a chemist,baker,wine shop as well as the big store itself.It sells mostly food but also gardening things and stationery,electric appliances etc.The most expensive single item is a colour TV which was Â£239.95.The people who work in Morrisons mostly work five days but they have different hours.When we went it was Wednesday morning which is not very busy compared with Fridays.We were surprised tht more males were shopping than females.The majority were local.People like Morrisons because it is easy to get to and everything is under one roof.
